result.title: Sustainability plan for the peer to peer learning program
result.description: The aim of this task is to ensure the viability of the learning program after the projects end through a detailed and realistic sustainability plan, which will define a coherent strategy and an effective action plan for the further exploitation of the projects main outcomes and for keeping alive the communication channels between the city-network members. The sustainability plan will determine on how to keep clear and compelling the vision of the city-network, key impacts to be sustained, actions and milestones, main responsibilities, driving forces, motivation of supporters, take-up by the community, indicators to track progress.

result.title: International Observatory on Inclusive Science Education (IOISE)
result.description: This is the launching of a functional website, based on the guidelines describes in D2.2 that will provide useful tools, data and analysis for experts in science, science communication and educators for the promotion of inclusive science education. It will also provide tools and strategies to detect exclusionary practices in science, making thus possible to modify them in a more inclusive way. This website will also allocate the Bank of Images of Inclusive Science Education.

result.title: Report onpotential improvements in efficiency and sustainability of European biomass supply chains
result.description:
This report will point out the particular opportunities with highest potential for improvement of efficiency and sustainability of the different biomass supply chains.
The related drivers, barriers and challenges together with needed enablers - technological or other will be also identified.
Specific European opportunities will be highlighted and prioritized for future development.
